Text.val: 05.05.2011 JOH SCR16404 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and GB002 by GB902
10.05.2006 JJ SCR10959 Fixed bug fetching client currency

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(INVO_AWKAI) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_ADMNO = :2 and INVO_CLNTNO = :3 and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
